short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to show how much of current day, month or year has already passed in Percentage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Steps to Use:

1. Click the extension sun icon on the top right hand side where extensions icon reside. 
2. A pop up will appear on clicking that will show you the percentage


Hope you like it.
